name: Arcanist
description:
FLAVOR:

  • Wizards are finding the inner workings of all the other extant magic traditions, and maybe some new bits

  • Namecloaking?

  • Deities and natural forces don't like what they're doing, will resist or deter

WEAPONS:

  • none

ENGAGEMENT:

  • none

ABILITIES:

  • Classic wizard shit, manipulating objects, people's names on spells (should feel academic)

  • Lingua arcana, ability to make new spells. Can also pick up new ones from written sources.

  • Weird grab-bag of bits from other traditions, but not many and somehow distorted. Maybe some sort of hunt threshold that triggers wrath if you meddle too much.
